sections.title: Bard (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Bard class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Bard)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with simple weapons plus longsword, rapier, sap, shortsword, shortbow, and whip, as well as light armor and shields, with no arcane spell failure for bard spells when wearing light armor.

sections.title: Spells (Bard)
sections.description: Bards cast arcane spells spontaneously from the bard spell list, with all spells having verbal components and requiring Charisma to cast.

sections.title: Bardic Knowledge ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/gamemastering/special-abilities#extraordinary-abilities-ex)) (Bard)
sections.description: Adds half class level to all Knowledge skill checks and allows making all Knowledge checks untrained.

sections.title: Bardic Performance (Bard)
sections.description: Uses Perform skill to create magical effects for 4 + Charisma modifier rounds per day, with specific performances available at different levels.

sections.title: Cantrips ([Sp](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/basics-ability-scores/glossary#TOC-Spell-Like-Abilities-Sp-)) (Bard)
sections.description: Bards can cast 0-level spells without consuming spell slots and may use them repeatedly.

sections.title: Versatile Performance ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/gamemastering/special-abilities#extraordinary-abilities-ex)) (Bard)
sections.description: Allows using Perform skill bonus in place of associated skills like Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate.

sections.title: Well-Versed ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/gamemastering/special-abilities#extraordinary-abilities-ex)) (Bard)
sections.description: Grants +4 bonus on saving throws against bardic performance, sonic, and language-dependent effects.

sections.title: Lore Master ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/gamemastering/special-abilities#extraordinary-abilities-ex)) (Bard)
sections.description: Allows taking 10 on Knowledge checks with ranks and taking 20 on Knowledge checks as a standard action once per day.

sections.title: Jack of All Trades ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/gamemastering/special-abilities#extraordinary-abilities-ex)) (Bard)
sections.description: Grants ability to use all skills untrained, treats all skills as class skills at 16th level, and allows taking 10 on any skill at 19th level.

sections.title: Adoring Fan (Su) (Bard)
sections.description: 20th level performance ability that dominates a target during performance and charms them afterward on a failed Will save.
